headline: EMCOR (EME) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of specialty construction contractor company EMCOR (NYSE:EME) jumped 8.7% in the morning session after the company posted solid Q4 results, with full-year revenue guidance that significantly exceeded analysts' expectations. EPS also outperformed expectations, driven by higher operating income and improved margins. However, quarterly sales came in just shy of estimates. Overall, it was a strong quarter, with broad strength across key markets helping to balance out some segment-specific wea

headline: Emcor Group (EME) Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates
summary: Emcor Group (EME) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 14.08% and 2.64%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Emcor Group (EME) Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates
raw.summary: Emcor Group (EME) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 14.08% and 2.64%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: EMCOR (NYSE:EME) Misses Q4 Sales Targets, But Stock Soars 7.7%
summary: Specialty construction contractor company EMCOR (NYSE:EME) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024, but sales rose 9.6% year on year to $3.77 billion. On the other hand, the company’s full-year revenue guidance of $16.5 billion at the midpoint came in 4.5% above analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $6.32 per share was 9.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Emcor Group: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Norwalk, Connecticut-based company said it had profit of $6.32 per share. The construction and maintenance company posted revenue of $3.77 billion in the period. For the year, the company reported profit of $1.01 billion, or $21.52 per share.
